title: Question about the bug happening in the latest patch 6.1?
body:
Will we get our account ban for "Dodging" the game too much due to the recent champion selection bug?
I have been penalized for a 15 minutes queue already...
Do we get ban if I continue to play and the bug sometimes decided to make me "dodge" the game?
I play Ai game the most and I noticed those "Unapproved Third Party Programs" are doing just fine every time in champion selection.

replies.body:
>I play Ai game the most and I noticed those "Unapproved Third Party Programs" are doing just fine every time in champion selection.

Cause they don't change Summoner spells.
It happened to me a few times when I didnt do anything too. Just click "accept" as usual and when I go into champion select, the client will still go dark... then you cant do anything..

It's because Riot's system of banning players is messed up. I have been having the same issue. This game sucks. Guess that's what you get from a cheap free-to-play game. There isn't even any way we get an official word from their side.
